H0.text: What mountain's peak is the farthest point from Earth's centre/center. Mount Everest

H1.text: What mountain's peak is the farthest point from Earth's centre/center. Mauna Kea

H2.text: What mountain's peak is the farthest point from Earth's centre/center. Denali (formerly known as Mount McKinley)

H3.text: What mountain's peak is the farthest point from Earth's centre/center. Chimborazo

A4.text: the summit of Chimborazo is 6,384.4 km from Earth's center, 2.1 km farther than the summit of Everest

A5.text: the summit of Everest is 6,382.3 km from Earth's center
